Headline: #95 95th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 91st/Burley
ShortDescription: Eastbound 95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 92nd and Buffalo: due to street blockage near 91st/Burley.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 92nd and Buffalo: due to street blockage near 91st/Burley.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #49 Western and #X49 Western Express Temporary Reroute at Western/Pershing
ShortDescription: 49 Western and X49 Western Express are temporarily rerouted via Western, 40th, Western Blvd, Archer and Western, due to street blockage near Western/Pershing.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#49 Western and #X49 Western Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Western, 40th, Western Boulevard, Archer, then resume their normal route on Western, due to street blockage near Western/Pershing.

Allow extra travel time. 

(Revised)
